message.body: It's nice to see that this chatroom is actually relatively active at this point.
this site should set up notifications for when a message is recieved
As in if you have the tab open it gives you a toaster notification when a message appears. I guess that would depend on the auto update though.
I do have it favorited. I should probably pay more attention to it though
I'm just saying that it would be pretty cool if you would get a toaster notification through your browser. I've seen it done on other websites, so it should be possible.
